text: Alexander Špoljarić (Greek: Αλεξάντερ Σπόλιαριτς, ; born 28 November 1995) is a Serbian Cypriot football goalkeeper, who plays for Alki Oroklini. He also has a Serbian passport. ==Club career== Born in Limassol, he started playing football in Campus Sportivo Football Academy when he was 4 years old. After completing seven years at the academy, he trained with his father's academy for 1 year as a goalkeeper. Later he was with Aris Limassol academy until he was 17. Finally, he moved to Enosis Neon Parekklisia, which also became his first team after his youth career ended. In summer 2014, he joined OFK Beograd, where he made his professional debut in the last fixture of the 2014–15 Serbian SuperLiga season, against Jagodina. At the beginning of 2017, Špoljarić moved to Belgrade Zone League side Hajduk Beograd on six-month loan. In summer 2017, he moved to Grafičar Beograd as a single player. Ahead of the 2019-20 season, Špoljarić joined Alki Oroklini.Το Δ.Σ. της ομάδας μας ανακοινώνει τη σύναψη συμφωνίας με τον Αργεντινό Εμάνουελ Μποτσίνο Ραούλ, facebook.com, 18 June 2019 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|OFK Beograd |2014–15 |rowspan=2|SuperLiga ||1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |2015–16 ||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- |2016–17 |First League ||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- !colspan="2"| Total !1!!0!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!1!!0 |- |Hajduk Beograd (loan) |2016–17 |Belgrade Zone !10!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!10!!0 |- |Grafičar Beograd |2017–18 |League Belgrade ||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !11!!0!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!11!!0 |} ==Personal life== Alexander's father is Milenko Špoljarić, and Matija Špoljarić is his younger brother. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Limassol Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Cypriot footballers Category:Cypriot expatriate footballers Category:Cypriot people of Serbian descent Category:Cypriot people of Croatian descent Category:OFK Beograd players Category:FK Hajduk Beograd players Category:FK Grafičar Beograd players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players Category:Enosis Neon Parekklisia FC players Category:Aris Limassol FC players Category:Alki Oroklini players Category:Cypriot Second Division players
